title: Habitat quantity drives community assembly and feedbacks to coral performance
description: Analysis code and data for a field experiment examining how coral habitat quantity affects coral-associated fish and invertebrate community assembly and feedbacks to coral performance in Moorea, French Polynesia. Includes R scripts for statistical analyses, figure generation, and reproducibility documentation.
